mapping.oed_data: [map(&exclude(@, ['year', 'value']) | set(@, 'type', 'scalar'), oed_scalar), map(&exclude(@, ['timeindex_start', 'timeindex_stop', 'timeindex_resolution', 'series']) | set(@, 'type', 'timeseries'), oed_timeseries)][] | map(&set(@[1], 'id', @[0]), zip(range(`1`, sum([length(@), `1`])), @))
